OpenID CX v1 documentation

Contract Exchange

«  Privacy Data and Contract   ::   Contents   ::   Glossary  »

Contract Exchange¶

Protocal¶

Contract Exchange(CX) is a protocol to create Contract, share privacy data and provide access log.

Components¶

CX consists of the following components.

  • OpenID Artifact Binding
  • JSON
  • X.509 and PKI
  • JSON Simple Sign
  • JSON Simple Encryption

Process¶

  • Client provides Request.
  • Proposer collects all necessary Request from all Client.
  • Proposer advertise his service.
  • End User starts CX procedure for the service provied by Proposer.
  • End User agrees the Proposal and Signatory creates a Contract.
  • Proposer gets his Contract Part.
  • Client is notified his Contract Part available.
  • Server is notified his Contract Part available.
  • Client request End User s privacy data at Server.
  • Signatory collects all access log from all Client and Server.
